alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 29 at 1:35PM EST until November 30 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. The strongest winds will be above 2,500 feet elevation. * WHERE...In Virginia, Eastern Highland County, and Northern Virginia Blue Ridge and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. In West Virginia, Eastern Pendleton County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
